uuid: 10777412370 Productionizing basically means deploying the training job somewhere, mostly for them, it will be probably AWS Airflow, which will continuously keep on training while also productionizing their inferences so that every day they take their model, package it into like a Rest API and put it into some AWS container, dockerize it, and put it into AWS container using airflow to invoke it and get output from it.
